text: “Mhela wula nandiwapa walume wa nhanzi za Lubeni na Gadi na Manase ya kolilawilaga isanya, malajizo aga, ‘Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi wa hemwe, nakawapani isi ayi muihole. Lelo hemwe muwele na mong'ho hali wang'holozenu, muwe muwichigwe goya kitowa ngondo, mloche lwanda lwa Yolodani muwele kumwando kwa wang'holozenu Waisilaeli.
